extendedInfo.description: Property/Real Estate Search in India- Making Property Transactions Fast and SimpleDownload the FREE Real Estate App and get instant access to Indiaâs most comprehensive and 100% verified property listing on sale and rent â property details include unit rate, sitemap, property details, specifications and more.Whether youâre searching for Residential/Commercial RealEstate for Sale or Lease, Housing for Rent, Luxury Apartments, Villas, Penthouses and new project launches or developments, Favista Apartment Finder App gives you real-time access to listings, news and resources from Favista website!Features:â¢	Enhanced Property Search - filter by City, Location, property type, budget, keyword or BHK, buying or rentalâ¢	Advanced Property Search Filter: filter properties by New Launch, Under Construction or Ready to Move. Find   best property to suit your need as investment or end-usage.â¢	Integrated Property Search on Maps â Get access to Property on Google Maps, get property details like price, locality, accessibility, major landmarks near that location.â¢	Contact our Professional Agent with one touch -Show interest for Site visit.â¢	Augmented Reality based Property Search- Just Hold your mobile along the landscape to get live information of your surroundingsâ properties and their details. See the magic as all the properties in that direction comes on screen within 10 Kms radius.â¢	Get directions to properties youâre interested in. Save the property in your interested list.â¢	Advanced Property Rating System- Get property ratings of your favorite properties based on multiple parameters like builder quality, accessibility, resale value and more.â¢	One touch Property Listing â Want to place your property for sale/rent? Just visit our website: www.favista.com , fill up a simple form and Sit Back and Relax. Our Relationship managers will contact you for further assistance and take your property live on our website with Free Property Evaluation.About Favista Real Estate:Favista is a Real Estate advisory company that believes each real estate experience should be simple and successful. Favista is started by successful IIT-IIM entrepreneurs who are driven by the fundamental values of customer satisfaction, credibility, transparency and professionalism. Favista has some of the best professionals in real estate who are focused towards finding properties that suit your needs. Alongside our personal service, Favista offers a comprehensive online real estate portal with advanced features like virtual walkthroughs, neighbourhood information and ratings that help buyers in making informed property purchase decisions. Favista.com offers an extensive coverage of verified listings in Delhi-NCR, Gurgaon,Mumbai, Bangalore and is fast expanding to other cities in India. Favista Real Estate website features range of pioneering tools like  Property Map Service, 2 min assured call back on customerâs interest, Virtual 3D Walkthroughs of Properties,Facility to Sell/Rent out your property, dedicated Sales personnel for property buying/selling and renting assistance. Favista is the best property guide giving best advice!Stay connected with Favista:Facebook: /favistarealestateTwitter: @favistarealtyYoutube: /FavistaRealEstateWebsite: www.favista.comWe would be glad to hear your suggestions, comments on our Service quality, website or any other feedback. Do drop us a mail to sales@favista.com. We would make sure to implement on your suggestions to serve you better!Keywords: Property Broker India, Property Advisors India, Gurgaon Property, Mumbai Property, Noida Property, Bangalore Property, Dream Home, India Real Estate, Property Map Search, Luxury Property, Budget Property, Zero Brokerage,Property Rentals India, Property for SaleOther Apps in the Category: magicbricks property search, commonfloor property india, sulekha, olx, justdial(jd), housing.co.in "Housing India", trulia, realtor.com real estate,
